name: Aderrasi-crossroads(twitchmix)
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=1.000000
fDecay=0.980000
fVideoEchoZoom=1.000000
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.500000
nVideoEchoOrientation=1
nWaveMode=3
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=1
bWaveThick=1
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=0
bDarkenCenter=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=0
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=100.000000
fWaveScale=1.462191
fWaveSmoothing=0.500000
fWaveParam=0.000000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.500000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=1.000000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000000
fWarpScale=1.000000
fZoomExponent=3.000185
fShader=0.000000
zoom=1.000000
rot=0.000000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000010
dy=0.000010
warp=0.010000
sx=1.000000
sy=1.000000
wave_r=1.000000
wave_g=1.000000
wave_b=1.000000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
ob_size=0.005000
ob_r=0.000000
ob_g=0.000000
ob_b=0.000000
ob_a=1.000000
ib_size=0.250000
ib_r=0.250000
ib_g=0.250000
ib_b=0.250000
ib_a=0.000000
nMotionVectorsX=64.000000
nMotionVectorsY=48.000000
mv_dx=0.000000
mv_dy=0.000000
mv_l=0.500000
mv_r=1.000000
mv_g=1.000000
mv_b=0.500000
mv_a=0.000000
per_pixel_1=// this is really not supposed to be fast:
per_pixel_2=dx = dx + if(below(y,0.4), if(below(x,0.4), -0.01, 0), 0);
per_pixel_3=dy = dy + if(below(y,0.4), if(below(x,0.4), -0.01, 0), 0);
per_pixel_4=dx = dx + if(above(y,0.6), if(below(x,0.4), -0.01, 0), 0);
per_pixel_5=dy = dy + if(above(y,0.6), if(below(x,0.4), +0.01, 0), 0);
per_pixel_6=dx = dx + if(below(y,0.4), if(above(x,0.6), +0.01, 0), 0);
per_pixel_7=dy = dy+ if(below(y,0.4), if(above(x,0.6), -0.01, 0), 0);
per_pixel_8=dx = dx + if(above(y,0.6), if(above(x,0.6), +0.01, 0), 0);
per_pixel_9=dy = dy + if(above(y,0.6), if(above(x,0.6), +0.01, 0), 0);
per_pixel_10=volt = (bass+mid+treb)/3;
per_pixel_11=rot = rot + if(below(rad,0.2), +0.1*bass, 0);
per_pixel_12=sx = sx + if(above(y,0.4), if(below(y,0.6),
per_pixel_13=if(below(x,0.5), +0.045, 0), 0), 0);
per_pixel_14=sx = sx + if(above(y,0.4), if(below(y,0.6),
per_pixel_15=if(above(x,0.5), +0.045, 0), 0), 0);
per_pixel_16=sy = sy + if(above(x,0.4), if(below(x,0.6),
per_pixel_17=if(below(y,0.5), +0.045, 0), 0), 0);
per_pixel_18=sy = sy + if(above(x,0.4), if(below(x,0.6),
per_pixel_19=if(above(y,0.5), +0.045, 0), 0), 0);
per_pixel_20=zoom = zoom + if(above(rad,0.8), -0.01, 0);
per_pixel_21=zoom = zoom + if(below(rad,0.2), -0.1, 0);
per_pixel_22=warp = warp + if (above(bass,1.6), +2*bass-rad, 0);
